sys_hub_action_type_definition.annotation: Get approvals from catalog item approval table.
sys_hub_action_type_definition.description:
Get approvals from catalog item approval table.

Inputs:

  • Catalog Item Sys ID (String) - Sys ID of catalog item for which you want to get approvals.
  • Requested Item (Reference) - Request item for which you want to get approvals.
  • Request (Reference) - Request which is related to requested item.
  • Levels (Array) - No.of approvals levels to be retrieved. If empty, all levels will be return.

Outputs:

  • Status (Choice) - Success: If approval is retrived without any issue. Otherwise failed
  • Message (String) - Message related to status.
  • Approvals (Array oj JSON) - Approval details. Refer below for sample response
    [{
    "group" : "Comma separated user sys_id",
    "level" : "Approval level",
    "rule" : "Approval rule",
    "user" : "Comma separated user sys_id"
    }]
sys_hub_action_type_definition.name: Get Approvals

sys_hub_action_type_snapshot.annotation: Get approvals from catalog item approval table.
sys_hub_action_type_snapshot.description:
Get approvals from catalog item approval table.

Inputs:

  • Catalog Item Sys ID (String) - Sys ID of catalog item for which you want to get approvals.
  • Requested Item (Reference) - Request item for which you want to get approvals.
  • Request (Reference) - Request which is related to requested item.
  • Levels (Array) - No.of approvals levels to be retrieved. If empty, all levels will be return.

Outputs:

  • Status (Choice) - Success: If approval is retrived without any issue. Otherwise failed
  • Message (String) - Message related to status.
  • Approvals (Array oj JSON) - Approval details. Refer below for sample response
    [{
    "group" : "Comma separated user sys_id",
    "level" : "Approval level",
    "rule" : "Approval rule",
    "user" : "Comma separated user sys_id"
    }]
